Description.Text: The Sheraton JFK Airport Hotel is a new, full service hotel featuring a sleek design, and everything you need to be comfortable and productive. Conveniently located just 0.5 miles from John F. Kennedy Airport JFK at the crossroads of 134th Avenue and S. Conduit Avenue, the hotel offers easy access to the Belt Parkway, Van Wyck Expressway 678, and downtown New York City—just 12 miles away.
• Belmont Park - 6.4 km / 4 mi • St. John's University - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi • Nassau Veterans Memorial Coliseum - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi

Sheraton Hotel Jfk Airport offers 150 guestrooms. Beds feature premium bedding. Flat-panel televisions come with cable channels. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) is provided. Desks are also included. All guestrooms are non-smoking.

Sheraton Hotel Jfk Airport offers a restaurant and a bar/lounge. The property provides room service during limited hours. In addition to an indoor pool, Sheraton Hotel Jfk Airport provides a spa tub and a fitness facility. Business-related amenities at this 3.5-star property include complimentary wireless Internet access and a business center. This property also offers multilingual staff, concierge services, and laundry facilities. Onsite parking is complimentary.Sheraton Hotel Jfk Airport is a smoke-free property.
Dogs only Check-in time is 3 PM Check-out time is Noon Pet maximum weight in lb is 80

From East • Southern State Parkway to Cross Island South or Sunrise Highway to Belt Parkway West. • Take Exit 21A, Rockaway Boulevard. • Take North Conduit to 130th Street. • Turn left onto South Conduit Avenue. • The hotel is on the right. From North • Follow Queens Midtown Tunnel to lie east to Van Wyck South. • Take Exit 1W to North Conduit. • Turn left onto 130th Street. • Turn left on South Conduit. • The hotel on the right. From West • Follow Belt Parkway East. • Take Exit 19. • Continue on Nassau Expressway ramp to Lefferts. • Turn left onto Lefferts. • Turn right onto South Conduit. • Turn right onto 134th Street. From South • Take Southern Belt Parkway Exit 150 Street South. • Take Conduit Avenue to 134 Street. • The hotel is located on the left.
Sheraton Hotel Jfk Airport has a restaurant on site named Rosmary's Restaurant. Room service during limited hours is available.
